channel.title: SQL Help
channel.description: OK I am working on my site, which can be found in my sig*, And I want to add in a Desciption part in my SQL Database table. So The put the Site name, the port (80) and a description. In my code I have that all done. now all I need is to create a colomn(or whatever) called "describe" in the table. So far in the table I have URL, ID, & PORT.

item.title: SQL Help
item.dc:creator: @Clear Clear
item.description:
@Clear wrote:

Could you like do the code for me because I’m not very smart when it comes to MySQL.

Read full topic

item.title: SQL Help
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

Through PHP?

ALTER TABLE tablename ADD describe VARCHAR(xx);

Read full topic

item.title: SQL Help

item.description:
@Clear wrote:

OK I am working on my site, which can be found in my sig*, And I want to add in a Desciption part in my SQL Database table. So The put the Site name, the port (80) and a description. In my code I have that all done. now all I need is to create a colomn(or whatever) called “describe” in the table. So far in the table I have URL, ID, & PORT.
